source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_entity_dim (
    IMSEntityID,
    BDCIDLegacy,
    BDCIDCoded,
    IMSEntityName,
    IMSEntityNumber,
    IMSEntityNameContainer,
    IMSEntityNumberContainer,
    IMSEntityBusinessArea,
    IMSEntityIMSDataFlow1,
    IMSEntityIMSDataFlow2,
    IMSEntityBDCAttribute,
    IMSEntityUserID,
    IMSEntityInformationOwner,
    IMSEntityUser1ID,
    IMSEntityInformationExpert,
    IMSEntityType,
    IMSEntityStatus,
    IMSEntityPriority,
    IMSEntityResolution,
    IMSEntityWorkLog,
    IMSEntityBusinessCriticality,
    IMSEntityDateModified,
    IMSEntitySecurityGroups,
    IMSEntityAssignedUserID,
    IMSEntityUserLink,
    IMSEntityUserName,
    IMSEntityCreatedBy,
    IMSEntityCreatedByLink,
    IMSEntityByName,
    IMSEntityDateEntered,
    IMSEntityDeleted,
    IMSEntityDescription,
    IMSEntityHelp,
    IMSEntityModifiedByName,
    IMSEntityModifiedByUserID,
    IMSEntityModifiedByUserLink,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.ims_bdc_entity_number NULLS LAST) AS IMSEntityID,
    T1.bdce_id AS BDCIDLegacy,
    T1.id AS BDCIDCoded,
    T1.bdc_entity_name AS IMSEntityName,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_number AS IMSEntityNumber,
    T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c AS IMSEntityNameContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container, concat('BDC E - ',T1.ims_bdc_entity_number)) AS IMSEntityNumberContainer,
    T1.business_area_c AS IMSEntityBusinessArea,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_1 AS IMSEntityIMSDataFlow1,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_2 AS IMSEntityIMSDataFlow2,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1 AS IMSEntityBDCAttribute,
    T1.user_id_c AS IMSEntityUserID,
    T1.information_owner_c AS IMSEntityInformationOwner,
    T1.user_id1_c AS IMSEntityUser1ID,
    T1.information_expert_c AS IMSEntityInformationExpert,
    T1.type AS IMSEntityType,
    T1.status AS IMSEntityStatus,
    T1.priority AS IMSEntityPriority,
    T1.resolution AS IMSEntityResolution,
    T1.work_log AS IMSEntityWorkLog,
    T1.business_criticality AS IMSEntityBusinessCriticality,
    T1.date_modified AS IMSEntityDateModified,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntitySecurityGroups,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityAssignedUserID,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityUserLink,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityUserName,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityCreatedBy,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityCreatedByLink,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityByName,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityDateEntered,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityDeleted,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityDescription,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityHelp,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityModifiedByName,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityModifiedByUserID,
    'No Info' AS IMSEntityModifiedByUserLink,
    7                                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from))                                       AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.bdce_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_area_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_criticality,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.'))                                                                   AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_entity T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.ims_bdc_entity_number IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.bdce_id,
    T1.id,
    T1.bdc_entity_name,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_number,
    T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,
    T1.bdc_entity_num_container,
    T1.business_area_c,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_1,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_2,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,
    T1.user_id_c,
    T1.information_owner_c,
    T1.user_id1_c,
    T1.information_expert_c,
    T1.type,
    T1.status,
    T1.priority,
    T1.resolution,
    T1.work_log,
    T1.business_criticality,
    T1.date_modified
